/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their modern architecture reflecting the city's rapid urban development. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, construction cranes can be seen, hinting at the ongoing development in the city. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, casting sharp shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
